entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
